channel.title: Adding npcATTACK/npcCOMBAT - 525 [NEED HELP]

item.title: Adding npcATTACK/npcCOMBAT - 525 [NEED HELP]
item.dc:creator: @valintina valintina
item.description:
@valintina wrote:

Hey guys, ive been coding a 525 server lately and i decided to add God Wars but then i realized that i couldn’t attack the npc’s i spawned >.<. So i took a look at the files and there was no action at the option attack>npc thats because im using a pvp/pk base. Anyway i found a textdocument in PacketHandler called AttackNPC i didn’t really know what to do with it, this is wat it says:

package src.com.rs2hd.packethandler;

import src.com.rs2hd.Engine;

import src.com.rs2hd.model.Player;
import src.com.rs2hd.util.Misc;
import src.com.rs2hd.npcs.*;

public class AttackNPC implements Packet {

/**
 * Handles selecting the attack option on NPCs.
 * @param p The Player which the frame should be handled for.
 * @param packetId The packet id this belongs to.
 * @param packetSize The amount of bytes being recieved for this packet.
 */
public void handlePacket(Player p, int packetId, int packetSize) {
    if (p == null || p.stream == null) {
        return;
    }
    int junk1 = p.stream.readSignedByte();
    int npcId = p.stream.readUnsignedByte();
    NPC n = Engine.npcs[npcId];
Misc.println("[" + p.username + "] Npc Id: " + npcId);

n.npcAttack = p.playerId;
n.attackingPlayer = true;
	//n.requestText("Testing!");
    p.attackNPC = npcId;
    p.attackingNPC = true;
    //p.requestFaceTo(npcId);
}

}

Anyway for short i need to know how to add the ability for players to attack npc’s like gwd bosses
Reply/help ASAP - thanks [Attack option does appear]

Read full topic
